titles.title: Electing Members to serve on standing committees.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 1/6/1999--Introduced. Elects Members to the following House Committees: (1) Agriculture; (2) Appropriations; (3) Armed Services; (4) Banking and Financial Services; (5) Budget; (6) Commerce; (7) Education and the Workforce; (8) Government Reform; (9) House Administration; (10) International Relations; (11) Judiciary; (12) Resources; (13) Rules; (14) Science; (15) Small Business; (16) Standards of Official Conduct; (17) Transportation and Infrastructure; (18) Veterans' Affairs; and (19) Ways and Means.
